name: Retrowave Rider
storyline:
Drive forward onto the neon-lit road.
You will conquer the path before you. Use color-switching powers to reshape the levels to your advantage.

Hand-crafted level design
An unique mix of runner and puzzle that will keep you on your toes
Extra collectables that unlock customization options for your rider
Accessibility support for colorblindness, and for people with slower reaction times
summary: Retrowave Rider is a mash up of Geometry Dash and Guitar Hero. Dive into synthwave worlds filled with retro-inspired visuals and smooth synth sounds, and experience this journey with all of its trials and glories.
